summary: Cairo is the capital and biggest city of Egypt, with over 10 million people. It's one of the largest cities in Africa, the Arab world, and the Middle East. Cairo is famous for its connection to ancient Egypt, with places like the Giza pyramids nearby. The city was founded by the Fatimid dynasty in 969. It's known for its Islamic architecture and has been a cultural and political center for a long time. Cairo also has a big film and music industry and is home to Al-Azhar University, one of the oldest universities in the world.
title: Cairo
